name: ATLANTIS (itch) (lmd, someredfish, Saturn Cat, Hatman2s)
description:
Build in the ancient city of Atlantice. You venture into this forgotten city to unveil what happenned.

Your challenge is going to be to discover it and solve its mysteries.

Happy Adventures and Good luck!

This game was created for The Enigma Game Jam 

Bubbles give you consumable double jump!
